first.question: You decide to travel by tram. As you walk to the tram stop, you think about how you plan to pay for the ride.
answers: You order a ticket with the tram company's mobile app
You have already loaded the value into the travel card in advance
You buy a one-time ticket from the ticket machine before going to the stop
You are not going to pay

pysakki.question: You sit at the stop until the tram you expect arrives in sight.
answers: You’re not doing anything to show the tram driver that you want into the tram
You stand up and wave with your other hand to indicate that you want into the tram
You see that other person is waving at the driver, so you don’t do anything

ratikkaOhi.question: The tram continued its ride without stopping at the stop. What do you do?
answers: You will go home
You will wait for the next tram you will eventually get into

eiMaksuaPysakki.question: You sit at the stop until the tram you expect arrives in sight.
answers: You’re not doing anything to show the tram driver that you want into the tram
You stand up and wave with your other hand to indicate that you want into the tram
You see that other person is waving at the driver, so you don’t do anything

eiMaksuaRatikkaOhi.question: The tram continued its ride without stopping at the stop. What do you do?
answers: You will go home
You will order the ticket with the mobile app and wait for the next tram

eiMaksuaRatikkaSisaan.question: You get into the tram, but there is a ticket inspector in front of you. He's going to give you a fine and remove you from the tram.
answers: You accept the fine, apologize, leave the tram, and next time you will pay for the ticket
You try to run away and will try the same way next time too

ratikkaSisaan.question: Once you get into the tram, you'll see that there are plenty of empty places available.
answers: You go to sit on a free bench next to another person
You go to sit on a free bench alone
You stay standing in the middle of the hallway while preventing others from moving

haluuPysahtya.question: You want to leave the tram at the next stop.
answers: You press the stop button at the very last minute before the stop
No one has pressed the stop button, so you press it well in advance before the stop
You notice that other person presses the stop button, but you still press the button just in case

ulosRatikasta.question: The tram will stop at your stop and the doors will open.
answers: You calmly leave the tram
You thank the other passengers for the ride and leave the tram
You push other people as you leave the tram
